org.springframework.cloud.sleuth.stream

Interface SleuthSource


  • public interface SleuthSource
    Defines a message channel for instrumented applications to use to send span data to a message broker. The channel accepts data in the form of Spans to buffer multiple actual span instances in a single message. A client app may occasionally drop spans, and if it does it should attempt to account for and report the number dropped.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Dave Syer
    See Also:
    SleuthSink
